overview: Accordionist Richard Galliano takes the stage at the Jazz in Marciac festival -- along with talented musicians such as violinist Alexis Cardenas, bassist Philippe Aerts and percussionist Rafael Mejias -- for an evening of truly unique music. Each of the gifted players contributes their talents and creative juices to form a band that fuses jazz and tango music into a new and exciting sound.
title: Richard Galliano: Tangaria Quartet
